named-query.name: Banco.findByCodigo
named-query.query: select b from Banco b where b.codigo = ?1

named-query.name: Sucursal.findByCodigoBanco
named-query.query: select s from Sucursal s where s.banco.codigo = ?1

named-query.name: Sucursal.findByCodigo
named-query.query: select s from Sucursal s where s.codigo = ?1
